Regulation Name(s): Gene expression profiling test system for breast cancer prognosis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Agendia MammaPrint gene expression profiling microarray test to assess risk of distant metastasis in breast cancer patients
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic gene expression profiling test service used to assess risk of distant metastasis in Stage I or II, lymph node-negative breast cancer patients with tumor size ≤5.0 cm, indicated as a prognostic marker for physician use along with other clinicopathological factors
